snippet.title: Civilization V: Gods and Kings - Opening Cinematic
snippet.description:
This is the opening cinematic for Civ V's new expansion, Gods and Kings.

This Cinematic is copyright 2012 Take-Two Interactive Software and its subsidiaries. All rights reserved. Sid Meier's Civilization IV, Civ, Civilization, 2K Games, the 2K logo, Firaxis Games, the Firaxis Games logo, and Take-Two Interactive Software are all trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc.
